ModifyContent:
You must uninstall the app and install the APK from Github if you are on Android.

## What's Changed
* Empty collections are now hidden
* Add "Download Books", "Remove Downloads" and "Delete Permanently" Popup Menu Button
* Add Remove collection button
* Add Unmerge Button in Series App Bar* Allow merging series with series and book
* Add selecting app bar to series view
* Collections are now collapsible
**Full Changelog and Release Details**: https://bit.ly/316eRSE
